amendment.description: To provide $40,000,000 in fiscal year 2009 to improve safety by increasing funds for tribal justice and law enforcement, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4268 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4268 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR 3/14/2008 S2078-2080) To provide $40,000,000 in fiscal year 2009 to improve safety by increasing funds for tribal justice and law enforcement, with an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4268 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4268 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Thune.
